title: Implement analytics tracking for order conversions
description: Add analytics tracking integration in src/app/api/shipping-webhook/route.ts:534. Should send conversion data to platforms like Google Analytics, Meta Pixel, etc.

title: Add accessories pricing to configurator
description: Implement accessories price lookup in src/lib/configurator/utils.ts:137. Currently hardcoded to 0. Should look up from products table when accessories feature is added.

title: Implement session ID from cookies for configurator
description: Get session_id from cookies or generate one properly in src/app/api/configurations/route.ts:32. Currently using temp-session with timestamp.

title: Implement tenant membership access control for books API
description: The assertTenantAccess() function in src/app/api/books/receipts/upload/route.ts and src/app/api/books/bank/import/route.ts currently returns true without validation. Needs proper tenant membership model implementation.
